<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>sn_kmf.KMFSmartOpsCertificate</api_name> <caller_access>2</caller_access> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description/> <name>KMFSmartOpsCertificate</name> <script><![CDATA[var KMFSmartOpsCertificate = Class.create(); KMFSmartOpsCertificate.prototype = { initialize: function() { },
signCertificate: function(certificateRequest) { return new sn_kmf_ns.KMFInstancePKI().signCertificate('SERVICENOW_SMARTOPS_STOREEDGE', certificateRequest); },
type: 'KMFSmartOpsCertificate' };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-10-31 17:49:29</sys_created_on> <sys_id>4c9e3b9053563110f952ddeeff7b12a2</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>KMFSmartOpsCertificate</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="ServiceNow Key Management Framework" source="sn_kmf">c515f25b53332300cd1eddeeff7b126e</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="ServiceNow Key Management Framework">c515f25b53332300cd1eddeeff7b126e</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4c9e3b9053563110f952ddeeff7b12a2</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-10-31 17:49:29</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
